articles.title: Bharti Airtel to set up tech centre in Pune, employ 500 - Economic Times
articles.description: Bharti Airtel Sunday said it will set up a digital technology hub in Pune, its fourth in the country, and will employ 500 people, as the telco pivots to becoming a digital services company.
